header.v: Ngày hiệu lực giao hoặc trùng nhau.
header.e: The effective date range overlapped or duplicated.

field.name: ma_dc
field.check: ma_dc not in (select ma_dc from dmccdc)⩓ma_dc in (select a.ma_dc from dmccdc a left join dmdvcsks b on a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs where a.ma_dc = @@table.ma_dc and b.ngay_ks >= @@table.ngay_hl_tu)⩓not exists(select 1 from cthspbdc b where @@table.ma_dc = b.ma_dc and @@table.ma_bp_dc = b.ma_bp_dc and @@table.tk_pb = b.tk_pb and @@table.tk_cp = b.tk_cp and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_sp = b.ma_sp and @@table.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and @@table.so_lsx = b.so_lsx and @@table.ma_hd = b.ma_hd and @@table.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and @@table.ngay_hl_den = b.ngay_hl_den) and not exists(select 1 from dmccdc c where @@table.ma_dc = c.ma_dc and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_new = 1))⩓exists(select 1 from cthspbdc b where @@table.ma_dc = b.ma_dc and @@table.ma_bp_dc = b.ma_bp_dc and @@table.tk_pb = b.tk_pb and @@table.tk_cp = b.tk_cp and @@table.ma_vv = b.ma_vv and @@table.ma_sp = b.ma_sp and @@table.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and @@table.so_lsx = b.so_lsx and @@table.ma_hd = b.ma_hd and @@table.ngay_hl_tu = b.ngay_hl_tu and @@table.ngay_hl_den = b.ngay_hl_den) and not exists(select 1 from dmccdc c where @@table.ma_dc = c.ma_dc and c.ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @@userID and r_edit = 1))

field.name: ma_bp_dc
field.check: ma_bp_dc not in (select ma_bp from dmbpcc)⩓not exists(select 1 from dmdcct b where b.ma_dc = @@table.ma_dc and b.ma_bp_dc = @@table.ma_bp_dc) and not exists(select 1 from dcbpsddc b where b.ma_dc = @@table.ma_dc and b.ma_bp_den = @@table.ma_bp_dc)

field.name: tk_pb
field.check: tk_pb not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: tk_cp
field.check: tk_cp not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_kh
field.check: ma_kh <> '' and ma_kh not in (select ma_kh from dmkh)

field.name: ma_vv
field.check: ma_vv <> '' and ma_vv not in (select ma_vv from dmvv)

field.name: ma_sp
field.check: ma_sp <> '' and ma_sp not in (select ma_vt from vdmsp)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from dmbp)

field.name: so_lsx
field.check: so_lsx <> '' and ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)) not in (select ltrim(rtrim(so_lsx)) from phlsx)

field.name: ma_hd
field.check: ma_hd <> '' and ma_hd not in (select ma_hd from dmhd)

field.name: ngay_hl_tu
field.check: ngay_hl_tu > ngay_hl_den⩓exists(select 1 from dmstt b where (@@table.ngay_hl_tu < b.ngay_gh1) or (@@table.ngay_hl_tu > b.ngay_gh2) or (@@table.ngay_hl_tu <= b.ngay_ks))
